headline: Gold Stocks Stay On Rebound Amid Trump Tariff Dividend Pledge
summary: Gold stocks kept rising early Tuesday, a day after a gold price rebound lifted a number of mining stocks and ETFs past key technical levels, flashing buying opportunities. AngloGold Ashanti led the rally after posting in-line earnings, confirming its full-year outlook and announcing a big dividend payment equal to 50% of free cash flow.

headline: Does Newmont’s 130% Rally in 2025 Make the Stock Fully Priced?
summary: Ever wondered whether Newmont stock is a hidden bargain or fully priced in? If you are searching for value in the materials sector, Newmont is sure to catch your eye. The stock has been on an exciting run, jumping 8.1% over the past week, 3.7% over the last month, and an impressive 130.0% year-to-date. This performance gives investors plenty to think about. Lately, major industry headlines and renewed attention on gold prices have put Newmont in the spotlight...
